sections.title: What is N26 and how does the bonus work
content: N26 is a digital bank with a European license, offering an online account with an Italian IBAN completely free of charge.
With the Standard plan, there are no opening costs or monthly fees, and you can manage everything conveniently from your smartphone.
Upon registration, you receive a virtual debit card usable immediately with Google Pay and Apple Pay.
By making a deposit of at least ‚Ç¨20 and a purchase of the same amount, you will receive ‚Ç¨15 directly into your account.
Additionally, you can earn ‚Ç¨20 for every person who registers with your invite and completes the bonus requirements.

sections.title: Main requirements
content: To get the bonus, you must deposit at least ‚Ç¨20 via SEPA transfer.
Once the deposit is received, make a purchase of at least ‚Ç¨20 with the N26 card (virtual or physical).
Purchases via PayPal are not valid, while Amazon recharges and e-commerce purchases are valid.
The physical card is optional and costs ‚Ç¨10 one-time, but you can use the virtual card for free right away.
The bonus is credited within 2-3 business days, maximum 60 days.
Each completed invite is worth ‚Ç¨20, up to a total maximum of ‚Ç¨1,500.
Identity verification is required via document scan (ID card, driver's license, or passport) and a selfie.
The account is available for all adults (18+).

sections.title: Step-by-step guide
content: 1. Register via a referral link (available on this page next to the N26 logo).
2. Fill in your personal data and upload the front and back of your ID, then follow the instructions for a verification selfie.
3. Once the account is verified, make an instant SEPA transfer from another account in your name of at least ‚Ç¨20 to your N26 IBAN.

4. As soon as the deposit arrives in your account, make a purchase of at least ‚Ç¨20 with the N26 virtual card, even via Google Pay or Apple Pay.
